dct_title_s: Gulf of Mexico : oil and gas activity and concession map 2020.
dct_description_sm: Inset: Offshore Mexico - Bay of Campeche "Map data correct as of March 2020". Includes color advertisements and statistical graphs and charts. Includes legend and abbreviations.
